com.slightlyloony.blog.objects

Class BlogObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.slightlyloony.blog.objects.BlogObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlogContentObject, BlogObjectObject

    public abstract class BlogObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an object stored on the blog, which could be metadata, static (including template generated) content, or content generated by code. The class includes provision for either storing the encoded byte form of the object, or as an input stream with known length. When an instance of this class resides in a cache, it is always in encoded byte form, compressed if possible, to minimize the memory consumed.
    Author:
    Tom Dilatush tom@dilatush.com
